channel.title: Help with item names!
channel.description:
i wana change names of items, i used 7zip/gzip to uncompress the .xml files on both the client and server of easyrsc and i cant seem to change partyhat to blue partyhat. i chagned it on both ends, put it back into a .gz and compiled over nad over and still the names wont change. any suggetstions ?
ALSO! i need a big client, im working on 1 but the position of the bank + Typed text is far off. thanks

item.title: Help with item names!
item.dc:creator: @vizi0n vizi0n
item.description:
@vizi0n wrote:

Thank you ADU, i thought i had done that but i missed that part. Thanks. Topic closed please, solved =]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with item names!
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

vizi0n:

No, i just want it to say the color of the partyhat / item. Is useless spam like that neccesary?

That was a legitimate question buddy.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with item names!
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

You will need to edit Items.rscd in the client conf folder. You can open it with 7-zip, edit it and then recompress it back to Items.rscd. The easiest way is to open the rscd file in 7-zip, double click the file inside and open it with your text editor, then when your done editing save it and simply drag the file you edited back into the 7-zip application and hit yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with item names!
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“vizi0n, post:4, topic:286588”][quote author=bonzakid link=topic=379011.msg2850864#msg2850864 date=1246528452]
itemdef change it,
save it,
compress it…
make sure you also put it in serverside in /conf
turn your server on…

Congratulations you now passed grade 2
[/quote]

Your stupid ass comments are unneccsary i’ve searched enough and tried everything. changeing server+clientside itemdefs + items.xml and still the item is named party hat not red partyhat.[/quote]

Are you color blind?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with item names!
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

Change itemDef.xml in both client and server side!
Plus you might need to chnage it in the amination.rscd from the client to.

Read full topic
